Class OrderMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • OrderMgr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class OrderMgr
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manages all the Order objects of the whole restaurants, basically the "manager" of RRPSS to Order objects

    This class provides various methods to create,update(add/remove MenuItem) of the Order, and view individual Order details and Invoice

    Since:
    2021-11-12
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
